staff.name: Anton Dmitriev
staff.bio: Hi! My name is Anton, I'm a second year PhD student researching wireless systems for Augmented Reality. In my free time, I like reading, bouldering, and doing judo.

staff.name: Roma Chandra
staff.bio: Hi! My name is Roma, and I'm a senior majoring in Math & CS. This is my third semester as a CA for CS 340, and I love reading, working out, and listening to music! Let me know if you have any recs :)

staff.name: Janice Mei
staff.bio: Hi! My name is Janice, I'm a senior studying Computer Science + Geography & GIS with a minor in Statistics :) I love to dance in my free time!

staff.bio: Interested in how systems work and where to eat next

staff.name: Frank Schmidt
staff.bio: I am a Statistics & Computer Science major who loves music, movies, and math! Most importantly, a proud Illini! Go Illini!

staff.name: Ria Bhargava
staff.bio: Hi! I’m Ria, a senior studying CS + Statistics, and this is my second semester on the CS340 course staff. I’m excited to meet you all and help you succeed this semester — please reach out with questions in office hours or on the forums. Outside of class, you can find me studying at cafés, going on a run, or hanging out with friends. Looking forward to a great semester!

staff.name: Albert Lee
staff.bio: 2nd year Computer Science + Education Major. Come find me playing board games where board games are played!
